title: Grants a waiver of the civil service examination fee to persons who have completed the displaced homemakers program or job training program
summary: Grants a waiver of the civil service examination fee to persons who have completed the displaced homemakers program or job training program; allows a waiver for a maximum of two examination applications duly filed within a one year period from the date of completion of the displaced homemaker program or job training program.

       AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to granting a waiver  of  the
         civil service examination fee to displaced homemakers

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The labor law is amended by adding a new section  827-a  to
    2  read as follows:
    3    S  827-A. CIVIL SERVICE EXAMINATION FEE; WAIVER FOR DISPLACED HOMEMAK-
    4  ERS. 1. THE COMMISSIONER, IN CONSULTATION WITH THE STATE  CIVIL  SERVICE
    5  DEPARTMENT, SHALL ESTABLISH A PROGRAM WAIVING THE CIVIL SERVICE EXAMINA-
    6  TION  FEE  FOR (A) PERSONS WHO HAVE SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED THE DISPLACED
    7  HOMEMAKERS PROGRAM, OR (B) FOR PERSONS WHO HAVE  SUCCESSFULLY  COMPLETED
    8  ANY  PUBLIC  AND PRIVATE JOB TRAINING PROGRAM OR OPPORTUNITY PROVIDED BY
    9  THE MULTIPURPOSE SERVICE CENTER AS ESTABLISHED PURSUANT TO SECTION EIGHT
   10  HUNDRED TWENTY-FIVE OF THIS ARTICLE.
   11    2. THE WAIVER, GRANTED PURSUANT TO SUBDIVISION ONE  OF  THIS  SECTION,
   12  SHALL BE ADMINISTERED BY THE COMMISSIONER, IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE STATE
   13  CIVIL SERVICE DEPARTMENT. EACH SUCH PERSON SHALL BE GRANTED A WAIVER FOR
   14  A  MAXIMUM  OF TWO APPLICATIONS FILED, IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS
   15  OF TITLE A OF ARTICLE FOUR OF THE CIVIL SERVICE LAW, TO  COMPETE  IN  AN
   16  EXAMINATION  FOR A POSITION IN A COMPETITIVE OR NON-COMPETITIVE CLASS OF
   17  CIVIL SERVICE EMPLOYMENT IN THE STATE OF NEW YORK OR ANY OF ITS SUBDIVI-
   18  SIONS, OR IN A LABOR CLASS WHEN EXAMINATION FOR APPOINTMENT IS REQUIRED;
   19  PROVIDED, HOWEVER THAT SUCH APPLICATIONS ARE DULY  FILED  WITHIN  A  ONE
   20  YEAR  PERIOD  FROM  THE  DATE  OF COMPLETION OF THE DISPLACED HOMEMAKERS
   21  PROGRAM OR JOB TRAINING PROGRAM.
